William L. Johnson

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Willie
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Dan Smith
  4. Location of Family: Ord, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Ord, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 3
  8. Date of Birth: 1903-01-01, Canada
  9. Date of Death: 1939, Arcadia, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: Find-A-Grave for William Johnson; Ord Quiz, 19 July 1906.
